item.title: ‘30% is untenable’: From Irish whiskey to Italian cheese, Trump's tariff threat rattles EU exporters
item.description: "At that 30% level ... it will be a lose-lose situation," one distillery boss told CNBC.

item.title: Israel's stock market outperforms Middle East counterparts despite multi-front wars
item.description: Israel's markets have been lifted by significant foreign investment and more recently by renewed investor confidence following its 12-day conflict wit...

item.title: Inflation outlook tumbles to pre-tariff levels in latest University of Michigan survey
item.description: Consumers' worst fears about tariff-induced inflation have receded, though they are still wary of price increases to come.

item.title: Kevin Warsh touts 'regime change' at Fed and calls for partnership with Treasury
item.description: Warsh called for sweeping changes on how the Fed conducts business and suggested a policy alliance with the Treasury Department.

item.title: Trump denies that he plans to fire Powell: 'Highly unlikely'
item.description: The comments came after the Supreme Court indicated that President Donald Trump does not have the authority to arbitrarily fire Fed Chair Jerome Powel...
